value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Is everyone ready to move out?
Emblian forces have moved to invade
Askr from the south.$k$pIntel reports show they're currently
stationed at an ancient temple known
as Vaskrheim.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|$w0|Vaskrheim? I've never heard of such
a place. Have you, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|According to legend, a divine weapon
was once sealed away there...$k$p$EFace|That weapon was the Breidablik. The
very one $Nu
carries today.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Does that mean this temple is
somehow connected to
$Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Possibly... But it's supposed to be
abandoned. Why would the Emblian
army set up there?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|There's a prophecy that goes, "A
legendary rite shall call forth Brave
Heroes."$k$pI believe a rite performed in
$Nu's world
has summoned such Heroes.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|What does it mean by Brave Heroes?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|To become a Brave Hero, you need
more than raw power or skill. Anyone
can train up their talents, after all.$k$pPeople must believe in them for more
than their strength, so these Heroes
must lead lives that truly inspire.$k$pWhen that happens, they'll be lifted
even higher. In a way, Brave Heroes
are born from the wishes of mankind.$k$p$EFace_Cool|But Embla wants to force these
Heroes under their control—and only
we can stop them. So, move out!$k$p

$WmMPID_総選挙リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|My name is Lyn, lady of Caelin and
daughter of the plains. My mother
was Madelyn, and my father Hassar.$k$pAnd in accordance with my contract,
I must challenge you to combat.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|Heh, you're a strong-looking bunch...
I must be lucky to have found worthy
opponents in a whole other world.$k$pI'm Ike, of the Greil Mercenaries.
Ready your weapons.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_総選挙アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|Ugh... Not too...shabby...$k$pAs much as I'd like to continue this
fight, I can't break the contract. We'll
have to take it from the top next time.$k$pI'll look forward to another test of skill.$k$p$Sbs150|
